metadata.title: Drift Through Memory: A Touching Adventure with Ghosts and Dogs
metadata.description: Explore the heartwarming story of 'Drift Through Memory', a moving puzzle game featuring a ghost dog helping his family cope with grief. Discover the game's features, controls, and read player reviews.
metadata.keywords: Drift Through Memory, ghost dog game, puzzle game, family pet game, game reviews, Picogram, Global Game Jam 2019

hero.p: Embark on a poignant journey with a ghostly companion as they explore their home, helping their family heal from loss. A beautiful puzzle game crafted with care by Picogram for Global Game Jam 2019.

gameFeatures.title: Game Features
features: Heartwarming narrative exploring themes of loss and healing.
Charming graphics and atmospheric music by Grahm Nesbitt.
Simple controls suitable for all ages.
Playable on HTML5 platforms, accessible on various devices.
Rated 4.8 out of 5 stars by over 3,850 players.

gameplayInstructions.title: Gameplay Instructions
instructions: Use the Arrow Keys on your keyboard to move the ghost dog.
Press 'Z' to interact with objects and progress through the story.
Explore each room to discover memories and assist the family in coping.
Pay attention to subtle hints in the environment for clues.
Enjoy the experience as an introspective journey, not just a game.

reviews.content: Loved this! It was so cute and left me with a warm feeling.

reviews.author: jujugames

reviews.content: Not my first time playing this, I lost my dog recently. It warms my heart.

reviews.content: I think listening to my Eminem playlist while playing might have ruined the mood but still one of the best games I've played in a while.
reviews.author: TSWC

questions.question: What platforms is 'Drift Through Memory' available on?
questions.answer: The game is available on HTML5 platforms, making it accessible on most devices with a modern web browser.

questions.question: How do I interact with objects in the game?
questions.answer: Use the 'Z' key on your keyboard to interact with objects and progress through the story.

questions.question: Who created the music for the game?
questions.answer: The atmospheric music in 'Drift Through Memory' was composed by Grahm Nesbitt.

questions.question: Is the game suitable for all ages?
questions.answer: Yes, the game features simple controls and a heartwarming narrative suitable for players of all ages.

questions.question: How long does it take to complete the game?
questions.answer: The game is relatively short, offering a compact yet emotional experience that can be completed in one sitting.

questions.question: Can I play 'Drift Through Memory' on my mobile device?
questions.answer: If your mobile device supports HTML5 games through a web browser, you should be able to play the game.
